title: Student activity: a case study on Dial-a-Bus
creator_credit: David Nelson, Open University and BBC-TV
brief_description: Looks at two Dial-a-Bus schemes, run by London Country Bus Services, and one in Manchester based on an agreement between Greater Manchester Transport, a public body, and Godfrey Abbot Ltd, a private bus contractor.
